creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: male figure in green cloak and white pants crosses bridge; carries two large bundles from long pole balanced over PR shoulder; mountains ULQ
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, and Seals

URQ: [Momijini ha tsurenaku mishimo/Ame sasou Arashi hakeshimi/Nahiku yamamatsu/Kiyō]   (The maple leaves/bring forth the rain.  The storm intensifies and the mountain pines flutter in the wind.)
medium: Ink and light colors on paper
title: Woodcutter Crossing a Bridge in Rain
